{"id":551122823,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1631046447,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/551122823/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        if(sqrt(n) - floor(sqrt(n)) == 0)\n            return 1;\n            \n        if(n <= 3)\n            return n;\n        \n        int res = n;\n        for(int i = 1; i * i <= n; i++)\n            res = min(res, numSquares(n - i * i) + 1);\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
